about_the_game:
Storage Looter is a loot game in a Voxel universe. Your goal is to collect the rarest and most profitable items in order to upgrade your store. From classic looting to metal detecting, many activities are available. Your finds can be sold or displayed at home.


From boxes, to disused offices, to a container storage area, there are many places to explore in order to find the most profitable objects. Collect historical objects on the beach by metal detecting, or open as many boxes as you want to improve your character as well as your store!



Complete missions with companies to make yourself known in the world of looting abandoned places. These companies will leave you free to come and go to different places, full of unique objects.


Only collect the essentials, your energy drops as you collect items and regenerates when you return home. This can be improved in order to collect more items per expedition.


Sell ​​your finds and buy upgrades to improve your store in which you can sell your rarest items! Buying furniture doesn't just look good, it will allow you to unlock features during your expeditions.

Storage Looter is a loot game in a Voxel universe. Your goal is to collect the rarest and most profitable items in order to upgrade your store. From classic looting to metal detecting, many activities are available. Your finds can be sold or displayed at home.


From boxes, to disused offices, to a container storage area, there are many places to explore in order to find the most profitable objects. Collect historical objects on the beach by metal detecting, or open as many boxes as you want to improve your character as well as your store!



Complete missions with companies to make yourself known in the world of looting abandoned places. These companies will leave you free to come and go to different places, full of unique objects.


Only collect the essentials, your energy drops as you collect items and regenerates when you return home. This can be improved in order to collect more items per expedition.


Sell ​​your finds and buy upgrades to improve your store in which you can sell your rarest items! Buying furniture doesn't just look good, it will allow you to unlock features during your expeditions.
name: Storage Looter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Storage Looter is a loot game in a Voxel universe. Your goal is to collect the rarest and most profitable items in order to improve your store. From classic recovery to a metal detector, there are many things to do!
